name: Brain Invaders
description:
A short fan game for Deepworld

The enemies get stronger, the bullets get faster. How long can you survive?


Controls
Space - Fire
Left and Right arrow keys - Move
Alternatively you can use the arrow buttons in the bottom corners

Changelog
1.0 - Protoplasmic Juice
Inital release
1.1 - Grey Matter
Added time delay between waves
Added wave numbers
Added mobile compatibility (maybe)
1.2 - Synaptic Gap
Added multiple bullet types
Added hit animation
Cleaned up visuals
Added more enemy types
Added more enemy formations
Refactored Code
